snippet: On the 50th anniversary of his first Masters victory, Jack Nicklaus talked about the winner’s jacket and Tiger Woods’s pursuit of his record of 18 major championships.
abstract: On the 50th anniversary of his first Masters victory, Jack Nicklaus talked about the winner’s jacket and Tiger Woods’s pursuit of his record of 18 major championships.

headline.main: Nicklaus Still Expects Woods to Set Record
headline.print_headline: Nicklaus Still Expects Woods to Set Record
